profiles.Fact: Despite it's unlikely locale, the Skylarks attract the best of NFL talent thanks to Southport's subtropical Florida-like climate and what some have called 'exploitative' visa arrangements

Packers FC were originally a Peckham-based association football club, but after growing tired of low pay and nil-nil draws, they chose to move the team to the desirable fish-packing district of New England and take up a more interesting sport. (Fact added by the editor)
After doing abysmally for a couple of decades, Hugh Laurie and Tony Robinson bought out the team to see if they could finally take them to the playoffs and ultimately the Super Bowl.

It was a historic season for the Cincinnati Bearcats football team last season, the first non-power 5 conference team to make the playoffs, and I really got into college football for the first time and made it to a game, so I had to name my team after them!
